title: EBS Snapshot Shared Externally
description: Detects when an EBS snapshot is shared with an external AWS account or made public. Attackers use this to exfiltrate entire disk images without downloading data, bypassing network-based DLP.
author: Antigravity
false_positives: Legitimate sharing of snapshots between internal org accounts (verify target Account ID)
Public datasets hosted by the organization (rare)
Disaster Recovery (DR) replication to cold storage account
recommendation: Identify the target Account ID in 'requestParameters'. If unknown, revoke the permission immediately using 'reset-snapshot-attribute' and investigate the snapshot content.
